Hero.description: Coco AI is a fully open-source, cross-platform intelligent search and assistant system designed for modern enterprises. It provides a unified search entry point to connect heterogeneous internal and external data sources, integrates large language model capabilities, and empowers teams to access knowledge efficiently, make smarter decisions, and collaborate intelligently.

Efficiency.title: Get It Done, Fast
Efficiency.description: Efficiency is Coco's core, from search to action, it's addictively fast.

Server.title: Your AI Brain, Powered by Coco Server
Server.description: As the core backend of Coco AI, Coco Server supports data source integration, AI assistant & model management, knowledge base construction, as well as MCP services and embedding capabilities, helping enterprises and developers deploy flexibly, manage centrally, and build customized intelligent work platforms.

Tools.title: Extend Your Stack
Tools.description: Plugins are capabilities, every extension makes you more powerful.

Deploy.title: Deploy Anywhere, Secure Everywhere
Deploy.description: Flexible deployment options, your data always in control, compliance has never been simpler.

Work.title: Work Transformed
Work.description: See what your workflow could become
Work.title2: Insert the Straw and Get Started

Community.title: Join Our Community
Community.description: Get the latest updates and discuss with other users

Download.title: Get Coco. Get Productive
Download.envText: * For other installation environments, please select
Download.window: Support for Windows 10 and above versions
Download.unbuntu: Supports Ubuntu 22.04 and later versions (X11 only)

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.description: Quick answers to common Coco use cases and features

Integration.description: From extensions to connectors — everything you need to build your ideal workflow in one place
Integration.extensionNotFoundDesc: The requested extension could not be found.

llmProviderStore.description: Explore and install the LLM providers you need

installDialog.title: Install {name}
installDialog.desc: Open the Coco Server extensions store page. The system will read the install link from your clipboard and show an installation confirmation dialog.

Roadmap.title: Roadmap Overview
Roadmap.subtitle: Features currently in development and planned for the future.

progressad.title: In Progress
progressad.subTitle: Features that are currently under active development.

content.title: Quicklink Plugin Support
content.subTitle: Integrates Quicklink plugins for instant actions from search results—such as opening files, sending emails, and more.

content.title: File Upload Support in Chat Mode
content.subTitle: Users can upload files in Coco AI's chat mode, helping users efficiently handle file-related tasks and issues.

content.title: Advanced Search Filters
content.subTitle: Supports precise filtering by data source, file type, time range, and more—making it easy to find exactly what you need.

content.title: File Parsing Service
content.subTitle: Provides configurable on-demand file parsing service that extracts key information and processes data, making it more suitable for subsequent search and AI analysis.

next.title: Up Next
next.subTitle: Planned features that are prioritized for the upcoming development cycles.

content.title: Remote Search Adapter
content.subTitle: Enables quick integration with existing search-capable databases or business applications without duplicating data to Coco AI.

content.title: Deep Research
content.subTitle: Implements Deep Research capabilities for automated scheduling, planning, and execution of complex data exploration tasks, making data discovery simpler and more efficient.

content.title: RAG Workflow
content.subTitle: Supports integration with external RAG workflow engines such as Dify, RAGFlow, n8n, and others.

content.title: Multimodal Hybrid Search
content.subTitle: Enables combined search across text, images, and more—enhancing discovery across different content formats.

content.title: Local File Preview
content.subTitle: Preview local file content directly within the platform—supports documents, spreadsheets, images, and more.

content.title: Support for More Connectors
content.subTitle: Provides more data source connectors for a more out-of-the-box data integration experience (such as Box, Dropbox, Slack, Zendesk, etc.).

completed.title: Completed
completed.subTitle: Features that have been successfully implemented and are now available to users.

content.title: Resizable Extension UI Window
content.subTitle: Coco AI App now supports resizing extension UI windows.

content.title: Open Newly Installed Extensions Directly
content.subTitle: Extensions installed in Coco AI App can now be opened directly—no need to go back to search.

content.title: Upgraded UI Experience
content.subTitle: Coco AI App replaces legacy components with shadcn/ui to improve visuals and interactions.

content.title: Coco Server Adds a Milvus Connector
content.subTitle: Coco AI Server adds a Milvus connector, enabling vector database storage and querying.

content.title: Coco Server Adds a Dropbox Connector
content.subTitle: Coco AI Server adds a Dropbox connector, supporting file storage and querying.

content.title: Compact Window Mode
content.subTitle: Coco AI App now supports a compact window mode

content.title: Window Transparency
content.subTitle: The Coco AI App main window now supports adjustable transparency

content.title: GitLab Code Review
content.subTitle: Coco AI Server now supports code review for GitLab Merge Requests

content.title: Built-in Coco Server Extensions Store
content.subTitle: Coco AI Server adds an extensions store that lets you install connectors, datasources, assistants, and more with one click

content.title: Coco Server Permission Management
content.subTitle: Coco AI Server now provides permission validation and management for connectors, datasources, assistants, and related resources

content.title: Extensions Store
content.subTitle: Coco AI can quickly integrate various plugins through the extensions store to extend App's functionality.

content.title: Window Management for macOS
content.subTitle: Through window management plugins, Coco AI can flexibly adjust window sizes and conveniently switch between different workspaces or monitors, enhancing multi-tasking efficiency.

content.title: Local File Search
content.subTitle: Users can directly search and access files stored on their local computers within Coco AI. Already supports Linux/GNOME, Linux/KDE, macOS Spotlight, and Windows Search.

content.title: View Extensions
content.subTitle: Coco AI supports custom UI to extend functionality. Users can customize the appearance and behavior of extensions according to their needs.

content.title: Data Connectors
content.subTitle: Coco AI can quickly integrate common data sources through data connectors, including network drives, local file systems, Confluence Wiki, GitHub, GitLab, Gitea, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.

content.title: Directory-style Data Source Browsing
content.subTitle: Users can browse data sources in a directory structure with hierarchical display and permission management support.

content.title: Web Search Component & Search Portal
content.subTitle: Coco AI has added a fully-featured search custom component type, providing complete web-based search mode where users can directly use Coco AI for searching within web pages.

content.title: Improved Input Handling
content.subTitle: Fixed inconsistent Enter key behavior for smoother input experience.

content.title: Notifications & Window Behavior
content.subTitle: Added notification component and improved window defaults (e.g., pinning, joining all spaces) for better usability.

content.title: File Search Enhancements
content.subTitle: Added support for macOS Spotlight and Windows file search.

content.title: Voice Input & TTS
content.subTitle: Search and chat now support voice input; text-to-speech powered by LLM.

content.title: Chat Mode Text-to-Speech Support
content.subTitle: Coco AI's chat mode can convert text content to speech, helping users access information more easily, especially for those with auditory needs.

content.title: Quick AI Assistant Access
content.subTitle: Enhanced quick switching between AI assistants in both search bar and chat mode.

content.title: Extensions Store
content.subTitle: Introduced the Extensions Store for browsing and installing custom extensions.

content.title: Keyboard & Navigation Improvements
content.subTitle: Tab/Enter support for dialogs; Delete key works as Back navigation.

content.title: Update Check
content.subTitle: Added version update checking so users know when a new release is available.

content.title: Enhanced Chat Input
content.subTitle: Multi-line input support with Shift+Enter/Enter.

content.title: AI Overview & Quick Access
content.subTitle: AI summaries in search results and faster access to AI assistants.

content.title: Context Menu Support
content.subTitle: Right-click menus for text selections and secondary pages.

content.title: Secure Connections
content.subTitle: Self-signed TLS support with user control over certificate validation.

content.title: History Management
content.subTitle: View, rename, and delete search history.

content.title: Custom Icons & UI Enhancements
content.subTitle: Icon support for results, sources, and assistants; refined borders and buttons.

content.title: AI Assistant & Calculator
content.subTitle: Added AI assistant capabilities and a built-in calculator.

content.title: Keyboard-Only Navigation
content.subTitle: Full keyboard support for search, history, and services.

content.title: Web Components & Widgets
content.subTitle: Support for embedding Coco AI as web widgets.

content.title: Custom Shortcuts
content.subTitle: Users can redefine preset shortcuts.

content.title: Multi-WebSocket Support
content.subTitle: Improved backend/server communication with multiple WebSocket connections.

content.title: Auto Updates
content.subTitle: In-app automatic updates to keep Coco AI current.

content.title: Chat UI Refinements
content.subTitle: Restructured chat component, improved layout, and better scrolling behavior.

content.title: Cross-Platform & Localization
content.subTitle: Added Windows and Linux support; introduced Chinese language support.

content.title: Networked Search Options
content.subTitle: Select data sources during searches; enable/disable servers.

content.title: DeepThink & Knowledge Search
content.subTitle: Added advanced retrieval modes in RAG-based chat.

content.title: Startup Experience Improvements
content.subTitle: Faster initialization with background loading of icons and server states.

content.title: Fusion Search
content.subTitle: Unified search across multiple servers and data sources.

content.title: AI Chat Assistant
content.subTitle: Conversational interface powered by AI.

content.title: RAG-based Chat
content.subTitle: Retrieval-augmented generation for smarter responses.

content.title: General Settings
content.subTitle: Global configuration, hotkeys, and auto-start options.

content.title: App Search (macOS)
content.subTitle: Search installed applications on macOS.

content.title: Self-Hosted Server Support
content.subTitle: Connect to your own Coco Server.
